name: The 14th International Symposium on Photonics and Optoelectronics
content: The 14th International Symposium on Photonics and Optoelectronics (SOPO 2022) Conference Date: August 16-18, 2022 Conference Venue: Xiamen, China Website: https://www.soposymposium.org/2022/ Online Registration System: https://www.soposymposium.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1506 Email: sopo\_service@126.com The 14th International Symposium on Photonics and Optoelectronics (SOPO 2022) will be held from August 16 to 18, 2022 in Xiamen, China. SOPO 2022 is co-organized by by Wuhan University, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications, IPOC State Key Lab, and other institutions. SOPO is an annual conference in China since 2009\. It was held in Wuhan, Chengdu, Shanghai, Suzhou, Xi’an, Beijing, Guilin, Sanya and Kunming from 2009 to 2021\. Each year there are 100 - 200 attendees from Asia, Europe, America, etc., and there have been quite a lot of well known experts giving plenary speeches. In 2022, SOPO will be held from August 16 to 18 in Xiamen, China. It dedicates to facilitating the global development of Photonics and Optoelectronics and exploring ways in which the latest research results can be shared. If you wish to serve the conference as an invited speaker, please send email to us with your CV. We'll contact with you asap. Publication and Presentation Publication: Open Access Journal，please contact us for detailed information Index: CNKI and Google Scholar Note: If you want to present your research results but do NOT wish to publish a paper, you may simply submit an Abstract to our Registration System.
